00051 EIG_PQGT1::EIG_PQGT1(SUP_PQGT1 &SZ) : EIG_PQG(SZ){

00153 double EIG_PQGT1::lsfunc(double alpha){
00154 
00155    double ward = this->EIG_PQG::lsfunc(alpha);
00156 
00157    for(int i = 0;i < n_dp;++i)
00158       ward += eig_dp[i]/(1.0 + alpha*eig_dp[i]);
00159 
00160    return ward;
00161 
00162 }

00167 double EIG_PQGT1::min(){
00168 
00169    double ward = this->EIG_PQG::min();
00170 
00171    if(ward > eig_dp[0])
00172       ward = eig_dp[0];
00173 
00174    return ward;
00175
